author: raghushantha
body:
This was built using Win8.1 CoreCLR runtime.
However 2012R2 works fine using the same runtime

`Start-PSBuild -Runtime win81-x64`

![pasted image at 2016_08_09 06_45 pm](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/11727200/17539604/44b1367e-5e64-11e6-9fcb-a97ecea1227e.png)

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
Installing this update resolves the error. FYI.

http://download.microsoft.com/download/9/3/F/93FCF1E7-E6A4-478B-96E7-D4B285925B00/vc_redist.x64.exe

title: Win8.1 x64 PowerShell needs VC x64 redistributable package as a dependency
